useCase.name: Update Expiry Info
useCase.description: This use case describes the process of updating the expiry information of an ingredient in the system.

mainSequence.step: The Chef selects the ingredient to update.
The UI Layer requests the current expiry date from the Backend Server.
The Backend Server queries the Database for the ingredient's expiry date.
The Database returns the expiry date to the Backend Server.
The Backend Server shows the current expiry date to the UI.
The Chef inputs the new expiry date.
The UI Layer submits the updated expiry date to the Backend.
The Backend updates the expiry date in the Database.
The Database confirms the update to the Backend Server.
The Backend Server confirms the successful update to the UI.
The UI updates the chef with the confirmation for the successful updating of the expiry info.
